name: JoJoJambo reprogrammed for Unity
description:
Reprogramming JojoJambo in Unity.

W A S D for movement on keyboard or pad/left stick on Joystick

J on keyboard or X on Joystick to shoot

K on keyboard or A on Joystick to jump

L on Keyboard or Right Shoulder on Joystick to hold movement and aim.

Enter/Start and Esc/Select to open or select things from the menu.

Original Game Here: https://didigameboy.itch.io/jojo-jambo-demo Thanks to DidiGameBoy (twitter.com/DidiGameBoy) and

MauricioMunky(twitter.com/MauricioMunky) for sharing assets.
